body.name: Dove Advanced Care Hand Wash Shea Butter & Warm Vanilla 4 Count for Soft, Smooth Skin, More Moisturizers than the Leading Ordinary Hand Soap, 12 oz
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
features: MOISTURE BOOST 5X COMPLEX: Infused with our unique blend of moisturizers and skin-natural nutrients, our Advanced Care Shea Butter & Warm Vanilla hand wash cares for hands so even knuckles, cuticles, and palms are moisturized
REMOVES GERMS IN SECONDS: This gentle skin cleanser washes away dirt and germs, while moisturizing hands for hours
LASTING NOURISHMENT: Our Advanced Care Shea Butter & Warm Vanilla Hand Wash formula nourishes skin 10 layers deep for soft, smooth hands
HOW TO USE: Add a generous pump of this hand wash to wet hands. Rub your hands together to work the product into a lather, before rinsing with water. Always wash for at least 20 seconds
DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED BRAND: Our Advanced Care Shea Butter & Warm Vanilla formula with gentle cleansers is as mild as water
body.description: Nourish your skin and uplift your senses with Dove Advanced Care Shea Butter & Warm Vanilla Hand Wash. Infused with our unique blend of moisturizers and skin-natural nutrients, this hand wash nourishes skin 10 layers deep, so even knuckles, cuticles, and palms are moisturized. Our Advanced Care formula effectively washes away dirt and germs, while moisturizing hands for hours. Plus, this hydrating hand wash is sulfate-free and paraben-free and uses 100% recycled plastic bottles. Dove care goes further than just cleansing your hands. Dove is a dermatologist recommended brand that is as mild as water and made with gentle cleansers. Also, our Advanced Care hand wash is vegan, and Dove is PETA Approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world. How to use: Add a generous pump of this hand wash to wet hands. Rub your hands together to work the product into a lather, before rinsing with water. Always wash for at least 20 seconds. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look—reaching over ¼ of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We are also committed to a landmark new initiative as part of our 2025 commitment to reduce plastic waste; reducing over 20,500 metric tons of virgin plastic annually by making the iconic beauty bar packaging plastic-free globally; launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles; and trialing a new refillable deodorant format. As one of the largest beauty brands in the world, we are revealing an agenda-setting commitment to tackle the global beauty industry’s plastic waste issue. More moisturizers vs the leading hand soap variant based on 2021 unit sales of non-antibacterial liquid hand soaps.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Advanced Care Shea Butter & Warm Vanilla Hand Wash, with our unique Moisture Boost 5X Complex, is more than just a hand soap. Not only does it wash away dirt and germs, but it also nourishes skin 10 layers deep for deeply moisturized knuckles, cuticles, and palms. Our Advanced Care Shea Butter & Warm Vanilla hand wash is vegan and Dove is globally approved by PETA.

MOISTURE BOOST 5X COMPLEX Unique blend of 5 caring ingredients that work with our nourishing formula to boost skin’s moisture. CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE Dove has a range of hand wash for everyone. Give your hands a moment of care every time you wash with Dove MORE THAN A BASIC HAND SOAP Our Advanced Care Hand Wash has been formulated to effectively wash away germs, while moisturizing skin for hours. DOVE SELF ESTEEM PROJECT Dove is helping 1/4 of a billion young people build self-esteem from 2004 to 2030.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove Advanced Care Hand Wash Peony & Rose Oil: A Gentle Indulgence for Your Hands
reviews.reviewText: Dove Advanced Care Hand Wash Peony & Rose Oil is a delightful hand soap that leaves my hands feeling soft, moisturized, and delicately scented. The floral fragrance is not overpowering, but rather evokes a sense of gentle elegance. I particularly appreciate how gentle this hand soap is on my skin, as I have found that some hand soaps can be quite drying. Dove Advanced Care Hand Wash Peony & Rose Oil, on the other hand, leaves my hands feeling supple and nourished, even after multiple washes.I wholeheartedly recommend this hand soap to anyone seeking a gentle and effective product that pampers their hands with a touch of floral grace. It's a true pleasure to use, and it has become an essential part of my daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Luxurious Handwashing Experience
reviews.reviewText: Dove Advanced Care Hand Wash with Peony & Rose Oil is a must-have for anyone seeking a handwashing experience that goes beyond the ordinary. With its enchanting scent, skin-loving formula, and value for money, this hand wash has secured its place as a permanent resident in my bathroom. Treat your hands to the care they deserve with Dove Advanced Care – you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the portion that come out when you use the pump. I also like the smell of it. It’s very nice. It rinses off your hands very easily leaving a nice soft skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells AMAZING & gentle on sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love dove products in general! This hand wash smells AMAZING and is gentle on my sensitive skin. It’s also sold at such a good price for 3 big bottles.10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great soap but leaks during shipping
reviews.reviewText: As some others have mentioned, the tops were not secured tight enough before the item was packed and shipped. When it arrived, I opened the package and noticed the product had already leaked in the box. At the time, the scent was very strong and I thought the scent may be too overpowering. Amazon was able to provide good support regarding my concern with the product leaking. After using what was left of the product, I did not think the scent was too strong. Perhaps the strong scent was only an issue because it had spilled out in the box and was not used with water as I would when I am washing my hands. The soap lathers well and does not dry out my skin as much, which is not the case for some soaps. This particular soap lathers well with just 1 pump of product. Being that the price of everything has risen, so has my standards. With that being said, it is very problematic when product spills out because I am not getting what I paid for. I hope the seller is taking note of the reviews that mention the same issue and makes changes to ensure the tops are screwed on tightly so that customers are getting what they paid for. I do like the soap, but I will probably try to find another seller so that I do not run into this issue again. I would have continued to purchase otherwise, but will have to switch to another seller until the issue is resolved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great on hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the creaminess and the delicate, but fragrant smell!
reviews.reviewText: I just love the foaming hand soap that was Pink Lotus and Rice Milk scent. The scent was light and refreshing. It was my favorite! I love the foam. Lately all I can find is Lavender (way too potent), and vanilla.They evidently Dove is changing what they offer. Gone are the Foams unless you buy refillable bottles, and the fragrances are not very feminine.Even though this is not a foaming hand soap, the smell sounded intriguing, so I decided to give it a try. I love it! It has a delicate aroma that reminds me of the Pink Lotus. I will definitely buy more of this if Dove continues to offer it! I would highly recommend it if you like a delicate, pleasant smell when washing your hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The scent is bordering on decadent
reviews.reviewText: Go away cracking hands!! Any time you are washing your hands, you should be using HAND soap & not dish detergent. Dish soap strips away the natural oils, which in a day or 2 can really dry out your hands. I ordered the 4-pack & have 1 each on the bathroom, kitchen, & soak tub sinks. The 4th is so I don't run out! If you use this hand soap for a week, instead of dipping into the dish lotion, you'll see a big difference in the skin on your hands. It won't feel a size too small & the cracks & dryness in your skin will start clearing up. Plus, it SMELLS great I have mild dermatitis on my hands &, if the product doesn't work, I don't by it again. This item has a home with me.
Great smell deep clean hight quality hand soap
Love Dove soap and this by far best price I've seen !!

It’s a good hand soap and it has lasted us a good amount of time. I think that this particular vanilla scent is a bit overpowering though, at least for me. Next time I will just get the original scent.
cleans with enough foam and is not drying my hands out
